name: Game-On Football
blurb: Game-On Football is a virtual betting app that allows fans to predict, in real time, the action as it unfolds during live NFL games

rewards.reward: Thank you. In return for your support you get a copy of the basic app when it is released. In addition, you will also receive a free copy of the premium version of the app when it is eventually released. Once again, thank you for your support
I really appreciate your support, not only do you get both versions of the app when they are released, you also get a cool drawstring bag featuring the Game-On Football logo.

Not only do you get both versions of the app when they are released as well as the drawstring bag, but you also get the first piece of the limited edition apparel being made for this campaign. \r\n\r\nYou get a super soft comfortable ultra blend t-shirt featuring the logo for the New York Gargoyles which has been exclusively designed for this Kickstarter campaign by the talented Gyula Nemeth. Thanks again.

Thank you. In return for your support, you get all of the rewards already described, except that instead of the drawstring bag, you get a messenger bag featuring the Game-On Football logo. In addition, you get an invite to beta testing period as we prepare for the release of the premium version of the Game-On Football. \r\n\r\nThank you for your support of Game-On Football.

Thank you so much for your support of Game-On Football. You get both versions of the app when they are released, the messenger bag, an invite to the beta testing period in the weeks prior to the release of the premium version of the app. 

You also get an upgrade in apparel to the second piece of limited edition apparel that is being produced for this Kickstarter campaign, a cool shawl collar rugby featuring an exclusively designed logo for a fictional Los Angeles team. 

I decided to try and have some fun in deciding what the second team name should be. I'm currently taking any suggestions, if you think you have a cool name that you also know would make a sweet logo, send me your suggestions on Twitter @GmOnFb. In a few days, I'll pick the top five suggestions and I'll put it to a vote, and the Gyula will design a cool logo of the winning name which will adorn the back of the sweatshirt. 

So not only do you get both versions of the app, a messenger bag, and an invite to the beta besting period, you'll also get a cool and unique piece of clothing that you'll can throw on once the weather starts to get chilly, I am very grateful for your support.

I can't thank you enough for your generous support! In return you get both versions of the app when released, the messenger bag, and an invite to the beta testing period. 

You also get the two different pieces of custom apparel being produced for Game-On Football's Kickstarter campaign. You not only get the shawl collar rugby sweatshirt that will feature the LA team logo that is going to be designed by Gyula, but you'll also receive a really cool letterman jacket featuring another exclusive logo designed by Gyula and once again I'm open to suggestions from you guys. Send me your suggestions on Twitter, think you have an even better idea for NY team name, or maybe even London? Send me your suggestions on Twitter @GmOnFb, I'll pick the best ideas and we'll put it to a vote once again. 

The body of the jacket will be black and 100% wool with black leather sleeves. The knitted collar and cuffs as well as vertical chest pocket will be accented with the main color that will be featured in the final logo design that will be displayed on the back. It's going to be a pretty cool piece of limited edition apparel, and you'll be one of very few in possession of one. 

Thank you for support!

You get everything from the previous reward level, copies of both apps, the messenger bag, an invite to the beta testing period, the shawl collar rugby sweatshirt, and the cool letterman jacket, but most importantly because of your generous support in helping me finally bring Game-On Football to life, you be listed as a 2012-13 sponsor for Game-On Football, your name or your brand will be displayed in the thank you section of Game-On Football's website as well as in the credits of the app. \r\n\r\nThank you so much for believing in what I am trying to do with Game-On Football, your support means a lot to me.

You get it all, the two versions of the app when they are released, a messenger bag, an invite the beta testing period, the limited edition sweatshirt, the limited edition shawl collar rugby, and the letterman jacket. You also get identified as a sponsor for Game-On Football, you name or your brand will displayed in the thank you section of Game-On Football's website as well as in the credits of the app. \r\n\r\nThe last reward will be your very own custom logo designed by Gyula. Think you have a cool idea for you own logo and would like to see come to life? Tell Gyula what you're thinking of, and he'll produce your own custom logo that you are free to use as you please. I'll also feature the logo on Game-On Football's website in the same area where you are identified as a sponsor drawing even more attention to you or your brand. I am very grateful believing in Game-On Football.
